tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Siamo noi
programme.desc: Un programma dedicato all'Italia che non si arrende, che crede nelle relazioni, promuove la solidarietà, crea soluzioni, condivide conoscenze e costruisce angoli di futuro.

programme.title: In cammino
programme.desc: Attraverso temi e ospiti diversi, si racconta il cammino della Chiesa verso il Sinodo, istituzione permanente del Collegio episcopale della Chiesa cattolica, fondato da Papa Paolo VI il 15 settembre 1965.

programme.title: I Santi
programme.desc: Un documentario dedicato alla storia di San Giovanni Paolo II, eletto Papa il 16 ottobre 1978. A maggio 2011 viene proclamato beato dal suo successore, Benedetto XVI. Ad aprile 2014, Papa Francesco lo proclama Santo.

programme.title: Federico II di Svevia
programme.desc: Documentario dedicato alla mirabile figura di Federico II di Hohenstaufen, morto nel 1250, uno dei più eclettici e determinanti personaggi della storia medievale, precursore, per certi versi, di una idea al tutto nuova di uomo.

programme.title: Il mio medico
programme.desc: Programma di informazione medica a servizio dei cittadini pensato per diffondere una cultura della salute basata sulla prevenzione, attraverso un linguaggio accessibile e l'ascolto del proprio corpo.

programme.title: Vediamoci chiaro
programme.desc: Scopriamo insieme tutti i consigli e le opinioni su come tutelare i cittadini, e alcuni suggerimenti e soluzioni ai piccoli e grandi problemi delle famiglie.

programme.title: Borghi d'Italia
programme.desc: Un viaggio sul territorio con lo sguardo rivolto alle persone, all'ambiente, al paesaggio al folklore. I borghi italiani visti come comunità e traino semplice, ma forte, di un intero territorio; il tutto dal vivo.

programme.title: Recita del Rosario
programme.desc: L'appuntamento con la riflessione, la meditazione e la recita dei misteri del rosario.

programme.title: Eccomi
programme.desc: Due storie differenti sulla vocazione e il percorso verso il sacerdozio. Scopriamo come si diventa ministri di Dio e che cosa è la chiamata, come era la vita precedente e come è cambiata dopo.

programme.title: Quel che bolle in pentola
programme.desc: Cuciniamo insieme una crostata diplomatica e una gustosa pasta e fagioli con le cozze.

programme.title: Effetto notte
programme.desc: Il cinema è un flusso, si alimenta delle sue storie, dei suoi volti, ieri come oggi. Effetto notte torna in versione rinnovata, e guida gli spettatori in un originale ma elementare percorso attraverso il cinema di ieri, di oggi e di domani.

programme.title: Recita del Rosario
programme.desc: L'appuntamento con la riflessione, la meditazione e la recita dei misteri del rosario.

programme.title: Terra Santa News
programme.desc: Il Franciscan Media Center propone tutte le settimane, da Gerusalemme, un notiziario che racconta la Terra Santa tra fede, storia, e attualità per svelare tutta la ricchezza di questa terra di Dio, così spesso dimenticata.

programme.title: Indagine ai confini del sacro
programme.desc: Addentriamoci insieme nel misterioso e segreto mondo delle sette e dell'occultismo, per scoprirne tutti i dettagli e le curiosità.

programme.title: TG 2000 Flash
programme.desc: Un'edizione rapida del telegiornale, per gli aggiornamenti sulle informazioni più importanti in materia di cronaca, politica, cultura, società e sport, a cura della redazione giornalistica della rete.

programme.title: Santa Messa
programme.desc: In diretta dalla Basilica di San Pietro in Vaticano, la Santa Messa celebrata dal Sua Santità, Papa Francesco.

programme.title: Di buon mattino
programme.desc: I due conduttori ci parlano di attualità, economia, costume, spettacolo, musica, cucina, curiosità, religione e feste popolari. In studio, insieme a loro, sono presenti anche ospiti ed esperti per discutere dei temi più vari.

programme.title: Caro Gesù
programme.desc: Una striscia quotidiana, dedicata ai più piccoli che seguono un percorso di fede. La catechista in studio risponde alle domande dei bambini in materia di religione.

programme.title: Quel che bolle in pentola
programme.desc: Cuciniamo insieme delle seppie con lenticchie, delle tigelle e una gustosa pinza.

programme.title: Angelus
programme.desc: Il pontefice celebra il rito per i fedeli di tutto il mondo cristiano cattolico.

programme.title: TG 2000
programme.desc: Notiziario veloce e compatto che privilegia la società civile e la realtà internazionale, compresa quella che abitualmente resta fuori dai circuiti informativi.

programme.title: Marina
programme.desc: La storia d'amore tra Alex, giovane avvocato, e Marina, aspirante stilista, ostacolata dal rancore che divide le rispettive famiglie.

programme.title: Sulla strada
programme.desc: Sulle strade del mondo e della vita accompagnati dalla parola del Vangelo. L'analisi del Vangelo è illustrata da immagini animate che ci riportano la storia e l'ambiente in cui Gesù viveva.

programme.title: Coroncina alla Divina Misericordia
programme.desc: Seguiamo insieme la recita della preghiera devozionale, ideata nel 1935 da suor Faustina Kowalska. I versi sono ispirati dalla visione di un angelo di cui la santa fu testimone durante la sua vita.

programme.title: Alle porte del Giubileo
programme.desc: Scopriamo l'attualità dell'Anno Santo e prepariamoci a viverlo in maniera consapevole e spirituale.

programme.title: Marina
programme.desc: La storia d'amore tra Alex, giovane avvocato, e Marina, aspirante stilista, ostacolata dal rancore che divide le rispettive famiglie.

programme.title: I simboli del sacro
programme.desc: Aggiriamoci per le strade strette e tortuose di Siena alla ricerca del simbolo della melagrana. Al Museo Opera Duomo, scopriamo come anche nell'arte sacra tessile il simbolo della melagrana era ampiamente diffuso.

programme.desc: L'appuntamento con la riflessione, la meditazione e la recita dei misteri del rosario.

programme.title: Un angelo per papà
programme.desc: Tre bambini viaggiano da soli verso Washington per chiedere grazia per il padre, incarcerato ingiustamente per un crimine non commesso, al Presidente degli USA Hoover. Il loro sogno è quello di riavere il genitore a casa per Natale.

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Quattro anni dopo la Battaglia di Gallipoli, l'agricoltore australiano Joshua Connor si reca in Turchia alla ricerca dei tre figli dispersi in guerra. Una volta giunto a Istanbul inizia un viaggio attraverso il paese per scoprire la verità.

programme.title: La compieta, preghiera della sera
programme.desc: Le monache agostiniane del convento dei Santi Quattro Coronati in Roma recitano la compieta, preghiera della sera che comprende un salmo, una breve lettura e il cantico di Zaccaria.

programme.title: Recita del Rosario
programme.sub-title: Dalla basilica papale di Santa Maria Maggiore in Roma
programme.desc: Dalla cappella della 'Salus Populi Romani', la preghiera dei misteri da parte del clero locale.

programme.title: Sulla strada

programme.title: I Santi
programme.desc: Filippo Romolo Neri si trasferisce a Roma da giovane e dedica il suo tempo ai ragazzi di strada, senza distinzioni tra maschi e femmine, facendo nascere l'oratorio.

programme.title: Don Bosco
programme.desc: Il racconto della vita e delle opere di Giovanni Bosco, il santo fondatore dell'ordine dei Salesiani. Dai momenti bucolici dell'infanzia in Piemonte al lavoro costante con gli orfani.

programme.title: Documentario
programme.desc: Selezione di documentari proposti dalla rete e dedicati a temi culturali, sociali, storici, artistici e naturalistici. Il meglio della produzione nazionale e internazionale in ambito divulgativo.

programme.title: Finalmente domenica
programme.desc: Si racconta l'attualità attraverso interviste a personaggi famosi e protagonisti della cultura. Ascoltiamo storie di talento, di amore e solidarietà, testimonianze di fede e di conversione. Inoltre, gli eventi più importanti di Papa Francesco.

programme.title: Terramater
programme.desc: Una serie di documentari per approfondire la conoscenza e la comprensione del pianeta in cui viviamo, allo scopo di educare all'alleanza tra l'uomo e l'ambiente, seguendo gli insegnamenti di Papa Francesco.

programme.title: Soul
programme.desc: In ogni puntata un personaggio pubblico si racconta, aprendo una finestra sulla propria anima e sulla propria umanità. Lo fa parlandoci delle proprie radici, della propria storia, del rapporto con la religione e non solo.

programme.title: Tutti insieme appassionatamente
programme.desc: La Madre Superiora del monastero di Salzburg mette alla prova la vocazione di una postulante, la bella e giovane Maria, facendola lavorare come governante in casa della famiglia Von Trapp.

programme.title: Un amico molto speciale
programme.desc: Anton incontra un piccolo criminale che si traveste da Babbo Natale e lo convince a fare un giro assieme sulla sua slitta magica.

programme.title: Die Bremer Stadtmusikanten
programme.desc: Ein Esel, ein Hund, eine Katze und ein Hahn sind ins Alter gekommen und sollen darum geschlachtet werden. Doch sie fliehen in die Stadt Bremen und wollen dort als Stadtmusikanten ihr Glück versuchen.

programme.title: Märchenreise
programme.desc: Die Bremer Stadtmusikanten. Wer "Bremen" sagt, sagt auch "Stadtmusikanten" – kaum ein Märchen der Brüder Grimm ist so bekannt, kaum ein Fotomotiv so beliebt wie die Statue am Bremer Marktplatz.

programme.title: Tagesschau
programme.desc: Die Komplexität des Weltgeschehens verständlich erklärt: Berichterstattung über aktuelle politische, wirtschaftliche, soziale, kulturelle, sportliche und sonstige Ereignisse in komprimierter Form.

programme.title: Drei Haselnüsse Für Aschenbrödel
programme.desc: Der König findet es an der Zeit, dass sein Sohn heiratet. Viele junge Damen von nah und fern werden zu einem Ball eingeladen, bei dem sich der Prinz entscheiden soll.

programme.title: Loriot
programme.desc: Weihnachten bei Hoppenstedts. Weihnachten hat bei den Hoppenstedts alles so zu sein wie immer. Doch was alles passieren muss, bevor man es sich gemütlich machen kann, darüber kann sich Loriots Fernsehfamilie nicht einig werden.

programme.title: Familie Heinz Becker
programme.desc: Alle Jahre wieder. Weihnachten ist das Fest der Liebe und der Harmonie. Nicht bei Familie Becker. Der Weihnachtsbaum steht schief, die Christkindfigur ist weg, Vater Heinz ist gereizt und Hilde nervt.

programme.title: Evangelische Christvesper
programme.desc: "Die Nacht, in der alles möglich ist" – unter diesem Motto feiert die Gemeinde der evangelischen Lutherkirche in Köln-Nippes die diesjährige Christvesper.

programme.title: Tagesschau
programme.desc: Die Komplexität des Weltgeschehens verständlich erklärt: Berichterstattung über aktuelle politische, wirtschaftliche, soziale, kulturelle, sportliche und sonstige Ereignisse in komprimierter Form.

programme.title: Der Wunschzettel
programme.desc: Die Beamtin Pauline wünscht sich das Weihnachtsgefühl aus Kindertagen zurück. Wie ein wunderbares Zeichen erscheint ihr deshalb der Zettel eines kleinen Jungen, den sie an einem Ampelmast findet.

programme.title: Wenn Das Fünfte Lichtlein Brennt
programme.desc: Der Job von Flughafen-Weihnachtsmann Thorsten endet üblicherweise vor der Bescherung. Nicht jedoch diesmal.

programme.title: Tagesschau
programme.desc: Die Komplexität des Weltgeschehens verständlich erklärt: Berichterstattung über aktuelle politische, wirtschaftliche, soziale, kulturelle, sportliche und sonstige Ereignisse in komprimierter Form.

programme.title: Abenteuer Weihnachten – Familie Kann Nie Groß Genug Sein
programme.desc: Eine Patchwork-Familie gerät an Weihnachten in Streitereien, deshalb machen sich die Kinder heimlich auf den Weg, um alleine zu feiern.

programme.title: Die Feuerzangenbowle
programme.desc: Ein verrückter Plan, ausgeheckt in Sektlaune, macht aus dem Schriftsteller Dr. Pfeiffer einen Schüler, der nichts als Streiche im Sinn hat. Auch der ehrenwerte Professor Crey wird sein Opfer.

programme.title: Tagesschau
programme.desc: Die Komplexität des Weltgeschehens verständlich erklärt: Berichterstattung über aktuelle politische, wirtschaftliche, soziale, kulturelle, sportliche und sonstige Ereignisse in komprimierter Form.

programme.title: Katholische Christmette
programme.desc: An Heiligabend überträgt Das Erste live die katholische Christmette aus dem St. Marien-Dom in Hamburg. Gott ist Mensch geworden, das ist das zentrale Thema von Weihnachten.

programme.title: Deutschlandbilder
programme.desc: Deutsche Landschaften, Städte, Inseln: Begleiten Sie uns zu den schönsten Plätzen Deutschlands.

programme.title: Tagesschau

programme.title: Wenn Das Fünfte Lichtlein Brennt
programme.desc: Der Job von Flughafen-Weihnachtsmann Thorsten endet üblicherweise vor der Bescherung. Nicht jedoch diesmal.

programme.title: Panda, Gorilla & Co
programme.desc: Große Kinder, kleine Kinder. Zoo Berlin und Tierpark Berlin freuen sich über eine wahre Babyschwemme – und "Panda, Gorilla & Co." gratuliert mit einem Spezial, das den tierischen Nachwuchs und die dazugehörigen "Pflegeeltern"...

programme.title: Max Reload and the Nether Blasters
programme.desc: A small town video game store clerk must go from zero to hero after accidentally unleashing the forces of evil from a cursed Colecovision video game cartridge.

programme.title: Tales of the Dead: Grim Stories of Curses, Horror and Gore
programme.desc: Five friends gather on Halloween to continue their ritual of telling horror stories. Each one telling a more sinister tale than the next, unaware of the horror that awaits them on this all Hallows eve. A film from award winning director Kemal Yildirim. Less is More: May Walker suffers from a disorder known as BIID (Body Integrity Identity Disorder). She has a constant desire to be an amputee to feel complete. She struggles to cope until one day when a mysterious doctor makes her an offer that s impossible to refuse. (Awarded top 10 in the Zone Horror competition and shown at Fright Fest) Wolf Cry: Zack is a slacking teenager who is obsessed with horror movies to the point where nothing else matters. His constant daydreaming derails his life until one night he experiences something that profoundly changes his world forever. Penance: The city is in the grip of a sadist serial killer. Detective Klein is a recovering alcoholic whose career is in tatters until he is chosen by the serial killer to play a horrifying game of cat and mouse. Missing: Five friends investigating an ancient curse on Cromwell Street in England discover far more than they bargained for when they unknowingly unleash a dark force that has been lying dormant for centuries. Includes Special Features.

programme.title: Terror In Woods Creek
programme.desc: In the small town of Woods Creek, terror arrived in 1962 in the form of a mysterious Drifter. A chain of bizarre events & murder ensued then the Drifter left. Now, 50 years later, he has returned.

programme.title: Dead Walkers: Rise of the Fourth Reich
programme.desc: Reports of a growing terrorist threat in Romania lead the British Secret Service to send in some of their best men, but nobody returns from the field. In a final attempt to get through, Alpha One and Alpha Five are dispatched to try and uncover the truth. What they discover is a bizarre scientific and occult training ground of neo-Nazis descendants of Nazis who fled following their defeat in the Second World War. Over the years they have been researching the energy they call VRIL and utilizing it to grow an army of men and women who cannot be killed, because they're already dead. Attempting to stay under cover and out of sight, Alpha One and Alpha Five come face to face with the terror of the Nazi VRIL soldiers and witness shocking tortures and beatings used to energize the human soul. Mentally twisted, the leaders of this Nazi group are bent on taking over the world with their new VRIL army and bring about the rise of the 4th Reich.

programme.title: Forbidden Science - Clone Fantasy
programme.desc: Forbidden Science is a unique blend of noir science fiction and erotic programming. Set in the near future, the stories revolve around the evil corporation, 4Ever Innovations, whose young and brilliant scientists download and sell memories. They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Mars: Barren Rock or Inhabited Civilization?
programme.desc: Mars has always fascinated humanity. Was there ever life on Mars? Is their life on Mars? This program examines photographic evidence of what appear to be manmade structures on our mysterious neighbor and asks could Mars be a link to another civilization.

programme.title: Inca Civilization: Defeated or Diseased?
programme.desc: The sophisticated Inca civilization thrived for three centuries, had a powerful and dominate military and advanced architectural, mathematical, medical, and astronomical skills. How did Spain s Francisco Pizarro with 168 troops topple this empire in 1532.

programme.title: Forbidden Science - Clone Fantasy
programme.desc: Forbidden Science is a unique blend of noir science fiction and erotic programming. Set in the near future, the stories revolve around the evil corporation, 4Ever Innovations, whose young and brilliant scientists download and sell memories. They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Killer Insects: Myth or Menace?
programme.desc: Humanity is under attack from the most dangerous insects to ever inhabit Earth. This program examines expert projections that infectious diseases spread by insects could destabilize entire societies and affect worldwide populations for the next 20 years.

programme.title: World Mysteries - Butch Cassidy:Demise By Bullet or Old Age?
programme.desc: Legend says the famous bank and train robbers Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid fled to South America and were killed in a gun battle with Bolivian soldiers. Legend also says they survived. This program examines fact and folklore to resolve this debate.

programme.title: Killer Insects: Myth or Menace?
programme.desc: Humanity is under attack from the most dangerous insects to ever inhabit Earth. This program examines expert projections that infectious diseases spread by insects could destabilize entire societies and affect worldwide populations for the next 20 years.

programme.title: Roswell UFO: Weather Balloon or Flying Disc?
programme.desc: What happened at Roswell in July 1947? Did an alien spacecraft crash and the bodies retrieved or was it a weather balloon as authorities later claimed? Could this be the most shocking cover-up of the 20th century? This program examines that question.

programme.title: The Jurassic Dead
programme.desc: A unit of mercenaries must team up with a group of tech-geek students after America is struck with an EMP attack. Deep in the desert, they find the source of the terror, a mad scientist.

programme.title: Tales of the Dead: Grim Stories of Curses, Horror and Gore

programme.title: Max Reload and the Nether Blasters
programme.desc: A small town video game store clerk must go from zero to hero after accidentally unleashing the forces of evil from a cursed Colecovision video game cartridge.

programme.title: The Defiled: We Are All Meat
programme.desc: In a post apocalyptic world, science and technology have backfired leaving unfathomable destruction and a permanently diseased planet in its wake. A virus is mutating the human race turning innocent survivors into mindless cannibals. In a savage future world devoid of hope, a man infected with the deadly viral disease must cope with the burden of a new born son, ensuring his survival. Though he is infected, he does not allow his growing desire for human flesh to overcome his responsibility to the newborn. Along the road, traveling from town to town, he saves an unaffected woman from a certain death by facing down her perpetrators. Ultimately she joins him on his odyssey, a journey through hell on earth in search of a safe haven in which they can perhaps start a life together, both becoming committed to doing whatever it takes to make sure the child survives. Reminiscent of the work of Lynch, Maddin and Tarkovsky, The Defiled is a black and white epic of unparalleled artistry examining life, death and the ultimate sacrifice of love. Not since Carnival of Souls and Night of the Living Dead has a film captured the surreal outer dimensions of the human condition.

programme.title: Melvin
programme.desc: MELVIN is dead... Now, three years after his accidental murder, he is finally making up for lost time. After enlisting the involuntary help of nerdy college student Norton Pincus, he's ready to take on those who are responsible for his death. Melvin's thirst for vengeance will take this dynamic dork duo on a mind-blowing streak of throat ripping, vomit spewing, head decapitating and much, much more. Featuring a cameo by Troma Entertainment's Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger, Poultrygeist) and songs from The Sawyer Family, Monday With a Bullet and Double Plus Good. Melvin will teach you that getting picked on at school can be a real killer.

programme.title: Terror In Woods Creek
programme.desc: In the small town of Woods Creek, terror arrived in 1962 in the form of a mysterious Drifter. A chain of bizarre events & murder ensued then the Drifter left. Now, 50 years later, he has returned.

programme.title: The Bisbee Cannibal Club
programme.desc: Vegetarians are disappearing from the little town of Bisbee, AZ. When a group of locals discover that their secret hallucinatory cactus garden has been used as a human barbecue and burial site, the existence of the Bisbee Cannibal Club becomes horrifyingly apparent. They form a vigilante gang, calling themselves The Bisbee Cannibal Hunters, to avenge their garden, save a vegetarian or two from being eaten and try to survive the Cannibal attack from the legions of flesh eaters now running amok. Bonus Features includes the award winning short A Road Kill Cautionary Tale.

programme.title: Fast Zombies with Guns
programme.desc: Collateral Damage. Sometimes, it s unavoidable. Mobster Kingpin Paul Varlo s (Charles Ramsey) attempt to kill a potential rat by poisoning his personal water supply leads to something he never saw coming an outbreak of zombie carnage! To make matters worse, these zombies are different; they re faster, meaner and they re armed With the town being overrun by fast zombies with guns, one resilient band of people are left to attempt an escape to the nearest undead-free zone and survival.Meanwhile, Jake (Tony Swansey) and his girlfriend Laura (Leena Kurishingal) are cruising their way up to this sweet, little Midwestern town. One quick business transaction with the local mob boss, and they can continue on their way to some fun in the sun, as planned. However, what they discover is a deserted town at first.Will the group survive the terror that has befallen them? Will Jake and Laura get their money?? Will the zombies run out of bullets??? The answers can be found in Fast Zombies with Guns.

programme.title: Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead
programme.desc: An evil and corrupt U.S. government agency accidentally unleashes a virus on a small town while attempting to perfect a top-secret biological weapon designed to create the perfect army. The experiment goes horrificly wrong, when the advanced biological weapon transforms the residents of a sleepy Maryland town into ravenous flesh-eating Monsters - Zombies so bloodthirsty for human flesh that nothing can stop the carnage. A handful of citizens who have remained uninfected seek sanctuary in a local movie theater, holed up together preparing to make a last stand against the undead. This gore-soaked shocker is not for the squeamish, Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead will rattle you to your core.

programme.title: Darkslide
programme.desc: Five best friends, all extreme skateboarders, set out on a road trip to find one of their missing brothers. Their adventure quickly turns into an epic battle for survival.

programme.title: Planet Mars: Alien Outpost or Hostile Neighbor?
programme.desc: For thousands of years man has asked is Mars inhabited? The canals: Evidence of a past civilization? The face visible on the Cydonia region? Are the pyramid shapes on Mars connected to the Pyramids on Earth? What are the secrets of the Red Planet.

programme.title: Flights Over Area 51: American Experiments or Alien Aircraft?
programme.desc: This special interviews a man, who, as a teenage science prodigy, was allowed into the Area 51 base. He relates an amazing account of science and engineering far advanced from any known on earth. What is really flying over Area 51.

programme.title: Planet Mars: Alien Outpost or Hostile Neighbor?
programme.desc: For thousands of years man has asked is Mars inhabited? The canals: Evidence of a past civilization? The face visible on the Cydonia region? Are the pyramid shapes on Mars connected to the Pyramids on Earth? What are the secrets of the Red Planet.

programme.title: World Mysteries - Lincoln Assassination: Disgruntled Murderer or Political Adversaries
programme.desc: Did John Wilkes Booth act alone in assassinating President Lincoln? Was he aided by Confederate sympathizers? Was there a larger conspiracy at the highest levels of government? This program asks these questions and presents newly discovered evidence.

They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Apostle of Dracula
programme.desc: Lucy has a passionate and bloody affair with Count Dracula. Many years later, as she recovers from strange amnesia, she begins to realize her true identity as a creature who is thirsty for blood.

programme.title: Forbidden Science - Age of Cyborgs
programme.desc: Forbidden Science is a unique blend of noir science fiction and erotic programming. Set in the near future, the stories revolve around the evil corporation, 4Ever Innovations, whose young and brilliant scientists download and sell memories. They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Asteroid Collision: Doomsday Destruction or Passing Apprehension?
programme.desc: There are over 31,000 known meteor impact sites on Earth with craters up to 186 miles in diameter. Some experts say an impact doomsday scenario is science fiction. Others say it is only a question of when . Could humanity survive? Could Earth survive.

programme.title: Crop Signs: Off-World Warnings or Technological Tampering?
programme.desc: There have been 9,000 crop circle sightings in the last 30 years globally. Are these increasingly complex designs the result of microwave emissions? Communication from extraterrestrials? A simple hoax? This program examines the possibilities.

programme.title: Egyptian Pyramids: Architectural Wonder or Alien Engineering?
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Egypt are among the largest structures ever built. Archeologists and researchers have determined ancient Egypt lacked the tools and skills required to build the pyramids. So how did the Egyptians build them over four thousand years ago.

programme.title: World Mysteries - American POWs and MIAs: Dead or Imprisoned?
programme.desc: Official U.S. government policy is that there is no credible evidence that any POWs or those listed as MIA are still alive from World War II, the Korean War or the Vietnam War. Is that a true fact? What is the truth about the fate of our POWs and MIAs.

programme.title: The Defiled: We Are All Meat
programme.desc: In a post apocalyptic world, science and technology have backfired leaving unfathomable destruction and a permanently diseased planet in its wake. A virus is mutating the human race turning innocent survivors into mindless cannibals. In a savage future world devoid of hope, a man infected with the deadly viral disease must cope with the burden of a new born son, ensuring his survival. Though he is infected, he does not allow his growing desire for human flesh to overcome his responsibility to the newborn. Along the road, traveling from town to town, he saves an unaffected woman from a certain death by facing down her perpetrators. Ultimately she joins him on his odyssey, a journey through hell on earth in search of a safe haven in which they can perhaps start a life together, both becoming committed to doing whatever it takes to make sure the child survives. Reminiscent of the work of Lynch, Maddin and Tarkovsky, The Defiled is a black and white epic of unparalleled artistry examining life, death and the ultimate sacrifice of love. Not since Carnival of Souls and Night of the Living Dead has a film captured the surreal outer dimensions of the human condition.

programme.title: Max Reload and the Nether Blasters
programme.desc: A small town video game store clerk must go from zero to hero after accidentally unleashing the forces of evil from a cursed Colecovision video game cartridge.

programme.title: Dead Walkers: Rise of the Fourth Reich
programme.desc: Reports of a growing terrorist threat in Romania lead the British Secret Service to send in some of their best men, but nobody returns from the field. In a final attempt to get through, Alpha One and Alpha Five are dispatched to try and uncover the truth. What they discover is a bizarre scientific and occult training ground of neo-Nazis descendants of Nazis who fled following their defeat in the Second World War. Over the years they have been researching the energy they call VRIL and utilizing it to grow an army of men and women who cannot be killed, because they're already dead. Attempting to stay under cover and out of sight, Alpha One and Alpha Five come face to face with the terror of the Nazi VRIL soldiers and witness shocking tortures and beatings used to energize the human soul. Mentally twisted, the leaders of this Nazi group are bent on taking over the world with their new VRIL army and bring about the rise of the 4th Reich.

programme.title: Fast Zombies with Guns
programme.desc: Collateral Damage. Sometimes, it s unavoidable. Mobster Kingpin Paul Varlo s (Charles Ramsey) attempt to kill a potential rat by poisoning his personal water supply leads to something he never saw coming an outbreak of zombie carnage! To make matters worse, these zombies are different; they re faster, meaner and they re armed With the town being overrun by fast zombies with guns, one resilient band of people are left to attempt an escape to the nearest undead-free zone and survival.Meanwhile, Jake (Tony Swansey) and his girlfriend Laura (Leena Kurishingal) are cruising their way up to this sweet, little Midwestern town. One quick business transaction with the local mob boss, and they can continue on their way to some fun in the sun, as planned. However, what they discover is a deserted town at first.Will the group survive the terror that has befallen them? Will Jake and Laura get their money?? Will the zombies run out of bullets??? The answers can be found in Fast Zombies with Guns.

programme.title: Melvin
programme.desc: MELVIN is dead... Now, three years after his accidental murder, he is finally making up for lost time. After enlisting the involuntary help of nerdy college student Norton Pincus, he's ready to take on those who are responsible for his death. Melvin's thirst for vengeance will take this dynamic dork duo on a mind-blowing streak of throat ripping, vomit spewing, head decapitating and much, much more. Featuring a cameo by Troma Entertainment's Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger, Poultrygeist) and songs from The Sawyer Family, Monday With a Bullet and Double Plus Good. Melvin will teach you that getting picked on at school can be a real killer.

programme.title: Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead
programme.desc: An evil and corrupt U.S. government agency accidentally unleashes a virus on a small town while attempting to perfect a top-secret biological weapon designed to create the perfect army. The experiment goes horrificly wrong, when the advanced biological weapon transforms the residents of a sleepy Maryland town into ravenous flesh-eating Monsters - Zombies so bloodthirsty for human flesh that nothing can stop the carnage. A handful of citizens who have remained uninfected seek sanctuary in a local movie theater, holed up together preparing to make a last stand against the undead. This gore-soaked shocker is not for the squeamish, Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead will rattle you to your core.

programme.title: The Bisbee Cannibal Club
programme.desc: Vegetarians are disappearing from the little town of Bisbee, AZ. When a group of locals discover that their secret hallucinatory cactus garden has been used as a human barbecue and burial site, the existence of the Bisbee Cannibal Club becomes horrifyingly apparent. They form a vigilante gang, calling themselves The Bisbee Cannibal Hunters, to avenge their garden, save a vegetarian or two from being eaten and try to survive the Cannibal attack from the legions of flesh eaters now running amok. Bonus Features includes the award winning short A Road Kill Cautionary Tale.

programme.title: The Invisible Vegan
programme.desc: The Invisible Vegan explores the problem of unhealthy dietary patterns in the African-American community, foregrounding the health and wellness possibilities enabled by plant-based vegan diets and lifestyle choices. The documentary begins with the personal story of Jasmine Leyva, a 30-year-old black actress and filmmaker.

programme.title: While I Breathe I Hope
programme.desc: Through the experiences of South Carolina Politician Bakari Sellers, WHILE I BREATHE, I HOPE explores what it means to be young, Black, and Democrat in the American South. Executive Produced by Charlamagne Tha God.

programme.title: Gonzo Episode 1
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. Directed by Tiffany and co-written with Nicholas, Ladylike is a modern day noir that follows Vaughan and Harlan, two vintage vixens who have a penchant for retro and retribution. Not only are they bosom buddies, Vaughan and Harlan s disturbing pastime makes them a gruesome twosome.

programme.title: MANGO WARS
programme.desc: Mango Wars, a comedy set in present day Kingston, Jamaica, follows Mr. Brown who runs a mango jelly business with his pregnant wife, Mrs. Brown. Fed up with the theft of mangoes from his mango tree and the impending birth of his first child, he develops an elaborate plan to catch the thief red handed. But when all of the traps are set off by unlikely elements, Mr. Brown has to rethink what really matters.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson (playing himself) attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey (Minor Watson). Rickey wants Robinson to play in the minor leagues, believing he can become the first player to break the color barrier and play in the majors. The only catch: He is forbidden from defending himself against racial bigotry. Supported by his wife (Ruby Dee), Robinson is steadfast in his determination to win.

programme.title: T-Junction
programme.desc: After the passing of her estranged father, Fatima makes an unlikely friend at a hospital, Maria. Bound by pain, Fatima keepisodes coming back to hear Maria's tale of the T-junction where she found love and loss in a ragtag community.

programme.title: Upper Hand
programme.desc: Upper Hand dives into the nuanced challenges Black and brown communities have faced in finding their pathway into the new economy by way of technology access, skill development, and opportunity. Data journalist and author, Sherrell Dorsey, follows the thread of her grandfather's story, growing up in the Jim Crow south, his migration to Seattle, and how he leveraged a job in technology to lay the foundation for his family's economic future.

programme.title: The Destiny of Lesser Animals
programme.desc: A Ghanaian police inspector embarks upon a dangerous, crime-laden journey to realize his ultimate dream - to escape the ghosts of his past and return to America. Infusing the policier genre with West African cinematic traditions and a neorealist emphasis on everyday life, the film becomes the story of one man's journey to find his purpose in the context of post-colonial Ghanaian independence.

programme.title: Was Titanic's Rudder Too Small?
programme.desc: Was the size of Titanic’s rudder the real reason why she couldn’t turn in time to miss the iceberg? Was the rudder just too small for Titanic’s size? Former Naval Ofﬁcer, Parks Stephenson, gives us the answers.

programme.title: The Last Remaining Lifeboat
programme.desc: John White, from White Star Memories, takes us through the preservation of Nomadic’s last lifeboat. From her discovery in France to her Belfast restoration, White Star’s last remaining lifeboat carries on the legacy.

programme.title: The J.J. Davies Bag
programme.desc: As bodies were recovered on the Mackay-Bennett, they were given a number and the personal items found on the body were put into a mortuary bag. This is the real life story of one of those bags from Body No. 200.

programme.title: Goodbye Old Man
programme.desc: These incredible words written by the most senior surviving officer of the Titanic, gives us a rare and historic glimpse of the final moments of the senior men that night. It may surprise you to hear just how calm these men really were.

programme.title: Thomas Andrews’ Notes - Mark Chirnside
programme.desc: When Olympic made her maiden voyage in June 1911 from Southampton to New York, Thomas Andrews traveled onboard to observe and take notes on potential improvements for Titanic and other ships. Titanic Channel Host Mark Chirnside reveals how the suggested..

programme.title: The Story Behind the New Titanic Photo
programme.desc: It’s been described as one of the most spectacular photographs of Titanic ever seen. Where did it come from? Andrew Aldridge will give us the backstory behind this remarkable photograph.

programme.title: The Untold Story of the Titanic Deck Chair
programme.desc: The Titanic story goes out in so many different directions and this is one of them! A Titanic deck chair, recovered by the Mackay-Bennett and later auctioned, provides us with a new Titanic Story that you might not have heard before from Craig Sopin.

programme.title: Surprises Inside Titanic: The Marconi Room
programme.desc: Ken Marschall shows us the remarkable surprises they found inside Titanic’s Marconi room during James Cameron’s 2001 and 2005 dives to the wreck.

programme.title: Titanic’s Sunday Night Hymn Sing
programme.desc: The last formal social event on Titanic was the Sunday night hymn sing held in the second class dining saloon. Titanic Channel Host Robert Bracken provides us with new details about how this evening was destined to affect so many lives.

programme.title: An Enduring Mystery
programme.desc: It’s the million-dollar question in maritime history! Who was this ship that sailed close to Titanic and could quite possibly have saved everyone on board? Very few Titanic scholars have looked into this more than Senan Molony. Here’s his take on..

programme.title: The Identity Conspiracy
programme.desc: Was Titanic really swapped with Olympic? It’s a conspiracy theory that just will not die! Parks Stephenson may have the eyewitness accounts that will finally put all the conspiracy talk to rest.

programme.title: Memories from the Big Movie Part 2
programme.desc: Ken refers to it simply as the “Big Movie” and without question, it changed his life. In part 2 of this two-part series, Ken describes his feelings walking the decks at Foxs Baja Studios and what it was like working with his friend James Cameron.

programme.title: The Titanic Band
programme.desc: Legend tells us they played to the end, but what was daily life like on board for the Titanic Band? Bill Sauder gives us rare insight into not only the Titanic Band, but music on board ships in 1912.

programme.title: Ismay Urged More Speed
programme.desc: How involved was Bruce Ismay with the operation of White Star ships at sea? Did he really urge Captain Smith to ignore ice warnings? Senan’s uncovered an account from the Oceanic that suggests Ismay overrode the command of at least one Captain in a..

programme.title: The Picture of a Dog in a Lifeboat
programme.desc: Senan Molony’s uncovered an unbelievable picture of a dog being rescued in one of Titanic’s lifeboats. Was it possible that dogs were actually allowed to board lifeboats.

programme.title: Remembering Ruth Becker Blanchard Part 1
programme.desc: In this episode, Ken Marschall gives us a compelling look back at Titanic’s last night through the eyes of survivor Ruth Becker Blanchard.

programme.title: The Mirage Theory
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson gives us a clear and thorough explanation of the Mirage Theory. Does this theory really explain why Titanic hit the iceberg.

programme.title: Submarine Signals
programme.desc: In 1912, the greatest threat to shipping was not ice - it was fog. Bill Sauder explains how submarine signaling helped navigate ships like Titanic through treacherous waters.

programme.title: Shipwreck Diving
programme.desc: With the recent discovery of the German submarine in the North Sea, we decided to go into the archives and take another look at Richie Kohler’s Shipwreck Diving. In this remarkable episode, Richie tells of his own extraordinary discovery of a World..

programme.title: How the Wreck Has Changed
programme.desc: Titanic Channel host and famed Titanic Explorer P.H. Nargeolet takes us back down to the wreck for a look at Titanic’s changing conditions and deterioration.

programme.title: Should Titanic Have Turned into the Iceberg?
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson takes on the popular controversy that instead of trying to avoid the iceberg, maybe Titanic should have just turned directly into it? Could this have really saved Titanic.

programme.title: The Anchor Crane Mystery - Ken Marschall
programme.desc: When the first images of Titanic came back in 1985, everyone noticed how the bow anchor crane was turned to a very unusual position; even considering the crash into the ocean floor. Jim Cameron’s got one theory about what happened and Ken Marschall’s..

programme.title: Another View on the Coal Burning Fire
programme.desc: A recent documentary presented new theories about the coal burning fire onboard Titanic. Parks Stephenson gives his view of the fire and how it affected Titanic. Senan Molony and Parks Stephenson, two of our hosts, are on Titanic’s center stage.

programme.title: Please No Smoking But If You Must
programme.desc: In 1912 people knew that smoking was bad for your health. Titanic had designated nonsmoking areas around the ship but if you needed to light-up, the smoking lounges were waiting. Bill Sauder tells us there was more than just smoking going on inside.

programme.desc: Ken Marschall takes us behind the scenes of James Cameron’s blockbuster movie Titanic. Despite the desire to get everything right, there were a few things done deliberately wrong! For the first time, Ken give us the inside story.

programme.title: The Californian Was Not the Mystery Ship
programme.desc: Molony states categorically and for all times that the Californian was not the mystery ship. No matter how you come down on this issue, this segment is a must watch! Molony gives a very detailed and fascinating argument on this historical dispute.

programme.title: Should The Lookouts Have Had Binoculars? - Parks Stephenson REV
programme.desc: Why didn’t the lookouts have binoculars? If they had, could the disaster have been avoided? This is always a big debate around Titanic circles. Parks Stephenson’s answers to these questions may surprise you.

programme.title: Masabumi Hosono
programme.desc: The only Japanese passenger on Titanic helped save lives, but was ostracized back in his home country for the rest of his life. There’s been many published accounts about Hosono, but now Robert Bracken gives us the real story.

programme.title: Remembering Ruth Becker Blanchard Part 1
programme.desc: In this episode, Ken Marschall gives us a compelling look back at Titanic’s last night through the eyes of survivor Ruth Becker Blanchard.

programme.title: Selling Second Class
programme.desc: Senan Molony gives us a rare look at a Titanic advertising brochure directed at second-class passengers. What White Star was selling in the cutthroat world of transatlantic competition back in 1912, might surprise you.

programme.title: How Did Titanic Sink?
programme.desc: He’s visited the wreck more than 30 times in the last 25 years. P.H. Nargeolet gives us his personal observations about the wreck and how Titanic might have gone down.

programme.title: The Mirage Theory
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson gives us a clear and thorough explanation of the Mirage Theory. Does this theory really explain why Titanic hit the iceberg.

programme.title: Shipwreck Diving
programme.desc: With the recent discovery of the German submarine in the North Sea, we decided to go into the archives and take another look at Richie Kohler’s Shipwreck Diving. In this remarkable episode, Richie tells of his own extraordinary discovery of a World..

programme.title: Was Titanic's Rudder Too Small?
programme.desc: Was the size of Titanic’s rudder the real reason why she couldn’t turn in time to miss the iceberg? Was the rudder just too small for Titanic’s size? Former Naval Ofﬁcer, Parks Stephenson, gives us the answers.

programme.title: Five Scratches in the Hull
programme.desc: The prevailing theory has always been that Titanic sideswiped the iceberg creating a 300 ft gash along her side. Famed Titanic Explorer, P.H. Nargeolet, discovered five scratches down her side.

programme.title: Another View on the Coal Burning Fire
programme.desc: A recent documentary presented new theories about the coal burning fire onboard Titanic. Parks Stephenson gives his view of the fire and how it affected Titanic. Senan Molony and Parks Stephenson, two of our hosts, are on Titanic’s center stage.

programme.title: The Big Four
programme.desc: Celtic, Cedric, Baltic, and Adriatic proceeded the design of Olympic, Titanic, and Britannic. Titanic Channel Host Mark Chirnside reveals why in many ways, they were perhaps the most successful quartet of ships ever built for North Atlantic service.

programme.title: Was Olympic Retired Too Soon?
programme.desc: Olympic was taken out of service in 1935, after nearly a quarter of a century of a very successful career. Was she retired too soon? It certainly seems there was still plenty of life in her. Mark Chirnside looks at the reasons she was scrapped and why..

programme.title: The Padded Room
programme.desc: Hidden away in Titanic’s isolation hospital was a 5x6 room padded completely from top to bottom with canvas cushions. White Star didn’t talk much about the room, but Bill Sauder will tell you how it was used.

programme.title: An Experience of A Lifetime Diving Titanic
programme.desc: He was the first school teacher to dive Titanic, not once - but twice. In this very candid account, Titanic channel host Charles Haas tells us how nerves almost kept him from going. In the end, his journey to his beloved Titanic proved to be an exciting..

programme.title: The Untold Story of the Titanic Deck Chair
programme.desc: The Titanic story goes out in so many different directions and this is one of them! A Titanic deck chair, recovered by the Mackay-Bennett and later auctioned, provides us with a new Titanic Story that you might not have heard before from Craig Sopin.

programme.title: Rescuing the Telegrams
programme.desc: Charles Haas shares the remarkable story of how priceless pieces of Titanic history were rescued before they were almost lost forever from a dumpster in New York City.

programme.title: The Story Behind the New Titanic Photo

programme.title: Maiden Voyage Handbill
programme.desc: Senan Molony shares a rare artifact of the RMS Titanic and the White Star Line, showing just how important the ship was to commerce over the Atlantic.

programme.title: The Coal Burning Fire Photo

programme.title: Money Troubles

programme.title: The Hazards of First-Class Travel

programme.title: Did First Officer Murdoch Shoot Himself?
